title: 2009 Reader's Poll Results
author: Neil Clarke
excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: 2009 Reader's Poll Results
text:
Editorial
 2009 Reader's Poll Results
 Last month, we asked you to vote for your favorite artwork and short fiction publishing in Clarkesworld in 2009. The results are in and it is my pleasure to present the 2009 Clarkesworld Magazine Reader's Poll winners:
 Short Fiction
 
 1st Place (tie) - "The Radiant Car Thy Sparrows Drew" by Catherynne M. Valente AND "From the Lost Diary of TreeFrog7" by Nnedi Okorafor
 
 Artwork
 
 
 1st Place
 
 
 2nd Place
 
 
 3rd Place
 
 
 Unplugged Winners
 The winners in the voter drawing for copies of UNPLUGGED: THE WEB'S BEST SCI-FI & FANTASY: 2008 DOWNLOAD from Wyrm Publishing are Tim Moore, Sarah Frost, Michael Casse, Christine Gregory and Samatha McGinn.
 Congratulations to our winners and thanks to everyone that voted.
 Neil Clarke is the editor of Clarkesworld Magazine and Forever Magazine; owner of Wyrm Publishing; and a ten-time Hugo Award Nominee for Best Editor (short form). His anthologies include Upgraded, Galactic Empires, More Human Than Human, Touchable Unreality, The Final Frontier, Not One of Us, The Eagle has Landed, and the Best Science Fiction of the Years series. His latest anthology, The Best Science Fiction of the Year: Volume 6, is now available from Night Shade Books. He currently lives in NJ with his wife and two sons.
